normalViewCmdHdr.Title: Normal View
normalViewCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Modifies the viewpoint so that the sight direction is normal to the surface at the selection point.
normalViewCmdHdr.LongHelp: Select a surface in the 3D area.
3DcompareCmdHdr.Title: 3D Compare
3DcompareCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Compares two products by showing their differences.
3DcompareCmdHdr.LongHelp:
Select a first product (considered as new) and a second product (considered as old).

You can use the level selector to select from another level of the product structure.
DMU2DCompareCmdHdr.Title: 2D Compare
DMU2DCompareCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Compares two drawings or layouts by showing their differences.
DMU2DCompareCmdHdr.LongHelp: Select the drawing or layout from the database to perform the comparison
DMUColorOpacityOverloadHdr.Title: Color / Opacity
DMUColorOpacityOverloadHdr.ShortHelp: Change the Color and Opacity of the selected occurrences.
DMUPositionOverloadHdr.Title: Move
DMULevelSelectorHdr.Title: Level Selector
DMURemoveOverloadHdr.Title: Remove Overload
DMURemoveOverloadHdr.ShortHelp: Remove Overloads of the selected occurrences.
DMUEditPropertiesHdr.Title: Properties
